price: But those who strive to discredit Our verses[25], they are the people of the Blazing Fire.”
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ سَعَوۡاْ فِيٓ ءَايَٰتِنَا مُعَٰجِزِينَ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ
footnotes: [25] In order to defeat the Prophet (ﷺ).
